title: RDP keeps disconnecting from Google VM machine.
author: AviBy
body_snippet:
when connecting to the vm with the rdp client downloaded from gcp all is well.
When connecting via MRemoteNG it keeps disconnecting and connecting again after several seconds.
What is the issue?

comments.snippet: I would really appreciate any help regarding the above problem.
comments.author: AviBy

comments.snippet: hello, what version you are using?

comments.snippet:
> when connecting to the vm with the rdp client downloaded from gcp all is well. When connecting via MRemoteNG it keeps disconnecting and connecting again after several seconds. What is the issue?

In case it behaves differently, what RDP version is defined in the mRemoteNG settings?
